com.tikal.jenkins.plugins.multijob.Multi.description: WARNING: THIS IS AN AUTO-GENERATED JOB DEFINITION. CHANGES MADE USING THE ONLINE EDITOR WILL NOT BE HONORED. MAKE CHANGES TO THE JOB DEFINITIONS IN THE openshift/aos-cd-jobs REPOSITORY INSTEAD.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: INSTALL THE ORIGIN-CI-TOOL ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: INSTALL THE ORIGIN-CI-TOOL [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi latest="$( readlink "${HOME}/origin-ci-tool/latest" )" touch "${latest}" cp "${latest}/bin/activate" "${WORKSPACE}/activate" cat >> "${WORKSPACE}/activate" <<EOF export OCT_CONFIG_HOME="${WORKSPACE}/.config" EOF
source "${WORKSPACE}/activate" mkdir -p "${OCT_CONFIG_HOME}" rm -rf "${OCT_CONFIG_HOME}/origin-ci-tool" oct configure ansible-client verbosity 2 oct configure aws-client 'keypair_name' 'libra' oct configure aws-client 'private_key_path' '/var/lib/jenkins/.ssh/devenv.pem'

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: FORWARD PARAMETERS TO THE REMOTE HOST ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: FORWARD PARAMETERS TO THE REMOTE HOST [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel sudo chmod o+rw /etc/environment ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'JOB_SPEC=${JOB_SPEC:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'buildId=${buildId:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'BUILD_ID=${BUILD_ID:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'REPO_OWNER=${REPO_OWNER:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'REPO_NAME=${REPO_NAME:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'PULL_BASE_REF=${PULL_BASE_REF:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'PULL_BASE_SHA=${PULL_BASE_SHA:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'PULL_REFS=${PULL_REFS:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'PULL_NUMBER=${PULL_NUMBER:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'PULL_PULL_SHA=${PULL_PULL_SHA:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'JOB_SPEC=${JOB_SPEC:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'BUILD_NUMBER=${BUILD_NUMBER:-}' >> /etc/environment" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config openshiftdevel "echo 'CLONEREFS_ARGS=${CLONEREFS_ARGS:-}' >> /etc/environment"

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: SYNC REPOSITORIES ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: SYNC REPOSITORIES [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${HOME}" if [[ "\$( jq --compact-output ".buildid" <<<"\${JOB_SPEC}" )" =~ ^"[0-9]+"\$ ]]; then echo "Keeping BUILD_ID" else echo "Using BUILD_NUMBER" JOB_SPEC="\$( jq --compact-output '.buildid |= "'"\${BUILD_NUMBER}"'"' <<<"\${JOB_SPEC}" )" fi for image in 'registry.svc.ci.openshift.org/ci/clonerefs:latest' 'registry.svc.ci.openshift.org/ci/initupload:latest'; do for (( i = 0; i < 5; i++ )); do if docker pull "\${image}"; then break fi done done docker run -e JOB_SPEC="\${JOB_SPEC}" -v /data:/data:z registry.svc.ci.openshift.org/ci/clonerefs:latest --src-root=/data --log=/data/clone.json --repo=openshift,source-to-image=master \${CLONEREFS_ARGS:-} docker run -e JOB_SPEC="\${JOB_SPEC}" -v /data:/data:z registry.svc.ci.openshift.org/ci/initupload:latest --clone-log=/data/clone.json --dry-run=false --gcs-bucket=origin-ci-test --gcs-credentials-file=/data/credentials.json --path-strategy=single --default-org=openshift --default-repo=origin sudo chmod -R a+rwX /data sudo chown -R origin:origin-git /data SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 14400 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: BUILD AND INSTALL S2I ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: BUILD AND INSTALL S2I [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/source-to-image" make build sudo cp /data/src/github.com/openshift/source-to-image/_output/local/bin/linux/amd64/s2i /usr/bin echo "Printing s2i version" s2i version SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 300 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: BUILD BASE RHEL IMAGES ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: BUILD BASE RHEL IMAGES [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${HOME}" # purpose of this job is to build images that have subscriptions+necessary repos built in. # if you don't need a registry.access.redhat.com/rhel7 with such additions, don't use # this job as a parent
# inside temporary directory create docker build context for the new base image contextdir=\$(mktemp -d)
# copy the necessary files mkdir \$contextdir/{certs,repos,vars,keys} cp /var/lib/yum/*.pem \$contextdir/certs cp /etc/yum/vars/* \$contextdir/vars cp /etc/yum.repos.d/* \$contextdir/repos cp /etc/pki/rpm-gpg/* \$contextdir/keys
# Remove repositories we won't be needing and which require RH certs rm -rf \$contextdir/repos/redhat-rhui*
# remove google chrome repo rm -rf \$contextdir/repos/*chrome*.repo
# remove local openshift epel mirror - we will only temporarily mount this via imagebuilder during image builds rm -rf \$contextdir/repos/local_epel.repo
# Add the online-int repo which has the latest jenkins rpms cat <<EOF > \$contextdir/repos/rhel-7-server-ose-onlineint-rpms.repo [rhel-7-server-ose-onlineint-rpms] baseurl = https://mirror.openshift.com/enterprise/online-int/latest/x86_64/os/ failovermethod = priority gpgcheck = 0 gpgkey = file:///etc/pki/rpm-gpg/RPM-GPG-KEY-redhat-release, file:///etc/pki/rpm-gpg/RPM-GPG-KEY-redhat-beta, https://mirror.ops.rhcloud.com/libra/keys/RPM-GPG-KEY-redhat-openshifthosted name = A repository of dependencies for Atomic OpenShift Online-Int sslclientcert = /var/lib/yum/client-cert.pem sslclientkey = /var/lib/yum/client-key.pem sslverify = 0
EOF
# create Dockerfile cat <<EOF > \$contextdir/Dockerfile FROM registry.access.redhat.com/openshift3/ose:latest
RUN yum remove -y subscription-manager
ADD vars/* /etc/yum/vars/ ADD repos/* /etc/yum.repos.d/ ADD certs/* /var/lib/yum/ ADD keys/* /etc/pki/rpm-gpg/
RUN yum update -y && yum clean all ENTRYPOINT [] EOF
docker build --rm -t registry.access.redhat.com/openshift3/ose \$contextdir
# make sure the new image has valid certs docker run registry.access.redhat.com/openshift3/ose yum install -y tar
# create Dockerfile cat <<EOF > \$contextdir/Dockerfile FROM registry.access.redhat.com/openshift3/ose:v3.6
RUN yum remove -y subscription-manager
ADD vars/* /etc/yum/vars/ ADD repos/* /etc/yum.repos.d/ ADD certs/* /var/lib/yum/ ADD keys/* /etc/pki/rpm-gpg/
RUN yum update -y && yum clean all ENTRYPOINT [] EOF
docker build --rm -t registry.access.redhat.com/openshift3/ose:v3.6 \$contextdir
# make sure the new image has valid certs docker run registry.access.redhat.com/openshift3/ose:v3.6 yum install -y tar # this docker tag is for the jenkins image repo 3.6 branch; we did not introduce # the use of the ose image until 3.7 docker tag registry.access.redhat.com/openshift3/ose:v3.6 registry.access.redhat.com/rhel7
# cleaning rm -rf \$contextdir SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 3600 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: BUILD THE JENKINS IMAGES ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: BUILD THE JENKINS IMAGES [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/jenkins" make build TARGET=rhel7 make build TARGET=centos7 SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 10800 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: TEST THE JENKINS IMAGES ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: TEST THE JENKINS IMAGES [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${GOPATH}/src/github.com/openshift/jenkins" make test TARGET=rhel7 TAG_ON_SUCCESS=true make test TARGET=centos7 TAG_ON_SUCCESS=true SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 7200 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: CREATE DIRECTORY FOR DOCKER CONFIG ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: CREATE DIRECTORY FOR DOCKER CONFIG [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${HOME}" mkdir -p /tmp/.docker chmod a+rwx /tmp/.docker SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 14400 ${script}\""

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: ASSEMBLE GCS OUTPUT ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: ASSEMBLE GCS OUTPUT [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi trap 'exit 0' EXIT mkdir -p gcs/artifacts gcs/artifacts/generated gcs/artifacts/journals gcs/artifacts/gathered result=$( python -c "import json; import urllib; print json.load(urllib.urlopen('${BUILD_URL}api/json'))['result']" ) cat <<FINISHED >gcs/finished.json { "timestamp": $( date +%s ), "result": "${result}" } FINISHED cat "/var/lib/jenkins/jobs/${JOB_NAME}/builds/${BUILD_NUMBER}/log" > gcs/build-log.txt cp artifacts/generated/* gcs/artifacts/generated/ cp artifacts/journals/* gcs/artifacts/journals/ cp -r artifacts/gathered/* gcs/artifacts/
scp -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -r "$( pwd )/gcs" openshiftdevel:/data scp -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config /var/lib/jenkins/.config/gcloud/gcs-publisher-credentials.json openshiftdevel:/data/credentials.json

#!/bin/bash SCRIPT_START_TIME="$( date +%s )" && export SCRIPT_START_TIME && echo "########## STARTING STAGE: PUSH THE ARTIFACTS AND METADATA ##########" && trap 'export status=FAILURE' ERR && trap 'set +o xtrace; SCRIPT_END_TIME="$( date +%s )"; ELAPSED_TIME="$(( SCRIPT_END_TIME - SCRIPT_START_TIME ))"; echo "########## FINISHED STAGE: ${status:-SUCCESS}: PUSH THE ARTIFACTS AND METADATA [$( printf "%02dh %02dm %02ds" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME/3600 ))" "$(( (ELAPSED_TIME%3600)/60 ))" "$(( ELAPSED_TIME%60 ))" )] ##########"' EXIT && set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace && if [[ -s "${WORKSPACE}/activate" ]]; then source "${WORKSPACE}/activate"; fi script="$( mktemp )" cat <<SCRIPT >"${script}" #!/bin/bash set -o errexit -o nounset -o pipefail -o xtrace cd "\${HOME}" trap 'exit 0' EXIT if [[ -n "\${JOB_SPEC:-}" ]]; then if [[ "\$( jq --compact-output ".buildid" <<<"\${JOB_SPEC}" )" =~ ^\"[0-9]+\"\$ ]]; then echo "Keeping BUILD_ID" else echo "Using BUILD_NUMBER" JOB_SPEC="\$( jq --compact-output ".buildid |= \"\${BUILD_NUMBER}\"" <<<"\${JOB_SPEC}" )" fi docker run -e JOB_SPEC="\${JOB_SPEC}" -v "/data:/data:z" registry.svc.ci.openshift.org/ci/gcsupload:latest --dry-run=false --gcs-bucket=origin-ci-test --gcs-credentials-file=/data/credentials.json --path-strategy=single --default-org=openshift --default-repo=origin /data/gcs/* fi SCRIPT chmod +x "${script}" scp -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config "${script}" openshiftdevel:"${script}" ssh -F ./.config/origin-ci-tool/inventory/.ssh_config -t openshiftdevel "bash -l -c \"timeout 300 ${script}\""

hudson.tasks.Mailer.recipients: bparees@redhat.com cewong@redhat.com gmontero@redhat.com cdaley@redhat.com miminar@redhat.com obulatov@redhat.com agladkov@redhat.com
